assessment_item.title: ಮೊದಲ ಆಂಗ್ಲೋ-ಮರಾಠ ಯುದ್ಧವು ಈ ಒಪ್ಪಂದದೊಂದಿಗೆ ಕೊನೆಗೊಂಡಿತು.
assessment_item.body:
{"data":{"plugin":{"id":"org.ekstep.questionunit.mcq","version":"1.1","templateId":"horizontalMCQ"},"data":{"question":{"text":"

ಮೊದಲ ಆಂಗ್ಲೋ-ಮರಾಠ ಯುದ್ಧವು ಈ ಒಪ್ಪಂದದೊಂದಿಗೆ ಕೊನೆಗೊಂಡಿತು.

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"options":[{"text":"

ಮಂಗಳೂರು ಒಪ್ಪಂದ

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:3460"},{"text":"

ಶ್ರೀರಂಗ ಪಟ್ಟಣ ಒಪ್ಪಂದ

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:3461"},{"text":"

ಸಾಲ್‍ಬಾಯಿ ಒಪ್ಪಂದ 

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":true,"$$hashKey":"object:3471"},{"text":"

ಬಸ್ಸಿನ್ ಒಪ್ಪಂದ
